title: Binder: Binding Language Models in Symbolic Languages
desc: Binder was among the earliest works in LLM using tools, before Toolformer and ChatGPT plugins. By combining code and LLM API calls, Binder can solve complex reasoning problems with high-performance while being interpretable and scalable.

title: Instructor Embeddings: One Embedder, Any Task
desc: The instruction-finetuned text embeddings outperformed OpenAI embeddings. It achieved high popularity with over 500k downloads, 1k github stars, and usage in numerous projects.

title: UnifiedSKG: A Unified Framework for Structured Knowledge Grounding
desc: UnifiedSKG provides a unified and multi-tasking paradigm for structured knowledge grounding on 21 tasks with text-to-text language models. It has gains 500 github stars, serving as a popular toolkit for structured knowledge grounding.

title: DS-1000: A Natural and Reliable Benchmark for Data Science Code Generation
desc: DS-1000 is a code generation benchmark with a thousand data science questions spanning seven Python libraries that (1) reflects diverse, realistic, and practical use cases, (2) has a reliable metric, (3) defends against memorization by perturbing questions.

title: Spider: A Large-Scale Human-Labeled Dataset for Complex and Cross-Domain Semantic Parsing and Text-to-SQL Task
desc: Spider is one of the most widely-used semantic parsing datasets with 10k+ questions and 5k+ complex cross-table SQL queries over different domains.
